meta.videoTitle: How to Prevent & Treat Colds & Flu

title_zh: 锻炼时觉得不舒服吗？睡觉

paragraphList.text_en: When it comes to the question of whether or not to exercise when feeling sick, it's essential to consider the state of your body and immune system. The immune system plays a crucial role in protecting the body from illnesses such as colds and flu. To support the function of the innate immune system and potentially avoid falling ill, it is important to prioritize quality sleep and take care of your gut microbiome.
paragraphList.text_zh: 当涉及到在感觉生病时是否要运动的问题时，考虑到身体状况和免疫系统的状态就变得至关重要了。免疫系统在保护身体免受感冒和流感等疾病方面发挥着关键作用。为了支持先天免疫系统的功能并可能避免生病，优先保证充足的睡眠质量和照顾好肠道微生物群是非常重要的。

paragraphList.text_en: Quality sleep is vital for overall health and well-being, including immune function. When you get sufficient and restful sleep, it allows your body to repair and regenerate, supporting the optimal function of the immune system. Lack of sleep or poor sleep quality can weaken the immune system, making you more susceptible to infections.
paragraphList.text_zh: 优质睡眠对整体健康和幸福感至关重要，包括免疫功能。当你获得充足且充分休息的睡眠时，它将使你的身体得以修复和再生，支持免疫系统的最佳功能。缺乏睡眠或睡眠质量低劣可能会削弱免疫系统，使你更容易感染疾病。

paragraphList.text_en: Incorporating exercise into your routine can also benefit the immune system. Regular physical activity has been shown to enhance immune function by increasing the production of white blood cells and natural killer cells that help defend the body against pathogens. However, it is crucial to understand that not all forms of exercise have the same impact on the immune system.
paragraphList.text_zh: 将锻炼融入您的日常活动中也可以使免疫系统受益。研究表明，定期进行体育锻炼可以增强免疫功能，通过增加白细胞和自然杀伤细胞的产生，这些细胞有助于保护身体免受病原体侵害。然而，了解并非所有形式的锻炼对免疫系统的影响都相同至关重要。

paragraphList.text_en: Certain intensities and durations of exercise can potentially compromise the immune system, making you more vulnerable to colds and flu. It is important to find a balance in your exercise routine to avoid overexerting your body, especially when feeling rundown or experiencing general malaise. If you are feeling fatigued, heavy, or not like your usual self, it may be a sign that your body is fighting off an infection.
paragraphList.text_zh: 一些特定强度和持续时间的运动可能会对免疫系统造成影响，使您更容易受感冒和流感侵袭。在您的运动计划中找到平衡非常重要，以避免过度劳累身体，尤其是在感觉疲倦或出现一般不适的情况下。如果您感到疲劳、沉重或不像平常自己，这可能是您的身体正在抵抗感染的迹象。

paragraphList.text_en: In such cases, it is advisable to prioritize rest and allow your body the time to recover. Taking a hot shower or bath and getting into bed early can support the immune system in combating the illness. Pushing yourself to engage in intense physical activity when feeling rundown can further compromise the function of the innate immune system, potentially prolonging your recovery time.
paragraphList.text_zh: 在这种情况下，建议优先休息，让身体有时间恢复。洗热水澡或泡热水澡，早点上床睡觉可以帮助免疫系统抵抗疾病。当感到疲惫时强迫自己进行剧烈体力活动会进一步削弱先天免疫系统的功能，可能延长康复时间。

paragraphList.text_en: On the other hand, if you are not yet experiencing symptoms of illness and want to strengthen your immune system, engaging in appropriate intensity and duration of exercise can be beneficial. Exercise can act as a stressor that promotes a controlled inflammatory response, boosting the output of the innate immune system. By incorporating regular exercise into your routine when you are well, you can support your immune system's ability to combat colds and flu effectively.
paragraphList.text_zh: 另一方面，如果您尚未出现疾病症状并希望增强免疫系统，参与适当强度和持续时间的运动可带来好处。运动可以作为一种压力因素，促进受控的炎症反应，增强先天免疫系统的产出。在身体状况良好时定期进行运动可支持您的免疫系统有效应对感冒和流感。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, while exercise is generally beneficial for immune function, it is crucial to listen to your body and make informed decisions based on how you are feeling. Prioritizing quality sleep, maintaining a balanced exercise routine, and recognizing when to rest are key factors in supporting the innate immune system and overall health. By taking care of your body and immune system, you can better protect yourself against illnesses and maintain optimal well-being.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总之，虽然运动通常有益于免疫功能，但关键是要倾听自己的身体，根据自身感受做出明智的决定。优先保持高质量的睡眠，保持平衡的运动日程，以及及时休息的识别能力是支持先天免疫系统和整体健康的关键因素。通过照顾好自己的身体和免疫系统，您可以更好地保护自己免受疾病的侵害并保持最佳的健康状态。
